description.brief: A property sheet control for wxWidgets

package.description: Provides an easy way of editing properties in wxWidgets. We use a patched version of 1.4.7. 1.4.7 fixed a bad crash we were experiencing, as well as a lot of problems on OSX. We apply three patches: 1) fixes some scrollbar problems we were having. The patch is submitted back: link 2) changes it to not snap back to selection all the time. bug reported: link 3) adds the ability to set the font per cell. feature requested: link
package.author: Jaakko Salli
